Evaluate

**********************
Special note on Angles
**********************

| Most often, polar coordinates that are angle ranges in [0, 180] because a ship
 can be considered symetrical.
| To force the system to interpolate properly, you need to specify that the
 coordinate is an angle by using the *mpolar.Angle* class

.. autoclass:: mpolar.Angle

*********
Reference
*********

.. autofunction:: mpolar.evaluate
